parameters.sqlQuery:
MERGE `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.waitlist` T
USING `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.waitlist_stage` S
ON T.WAITLIST_PK = S.WAITLIST_PK

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    WAITLIST_REF = S.WAITLIST_REF,
    LOCATION_ID = S.LOCATION_ID,
    APPOINTMENT_ID = S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    CLIENT_ID = S.CLIENT_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    SERVICE_ID = S.SERVICE_ID,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    FROM_DATE = S.FROM_DATE,
    FROM_TIME = S.FROM_TIME,
    TO_DATE = S.TO_DATE,
    TO_TIME = S.TO_TIME,
    CREATED_DATE = S.CREATED_DATE,
    DELETED_DATE = S.DELETED_DATE,
    LOCATION = S.LOCATION,
    CLIENT = S.CLIENT,
    CLIENT_PHONE_NUMBER = S.CLIENT_PHONE_NUMBER,
    IS_NEW_CLIENT = S.IS_NEW_CLIENT,
    TEAM_MEMBER = S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    SERVICE_NAME = S.SERVICE_NAME,
    CATEGORY_NAME = S.CATEGORY_NAME,
    WAITLIST_STATUS = S.WAITLIST_STATUS,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL = S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    APPOINTMENT_REF = S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    NOTE = S.NOTE,
    SKU = S.SKU,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER = S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER = S.DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    SERVICE_DURATION = S.SERVICE_DURATION,
    SERVICE_PRICE = S.SERVICE_PRICE,
    _loaded_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    WAITLIST_PK,
    WAITLIST_REF,
    LOCATION_ID,
    APPOINTMENT_ID,
    CLIENT_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    SERVICE_ID,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    FROM_DATE,
    FROM_TIME,
    TO_DATE,
    TO_TIME,
    CREATED_DATE,
    DELETED_DATE,
    LOCATION,
    CLIENT,
    CLIENT_PHONE_NUMBER,
    IS_NEW_CLIENT,
    TEAM_MEMBER,
    SERVICE_NAME,
    CATEGORY_NAME,
    WAITLIST_STATUS,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    APPOINTMENT_REF,
    NOTE,
    SKU,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    SERVICE_DURATION,
    SERVICE_PRICE,
    _loaded_at
  )
  VALUES (
    S.WAITLIST_PK,
    S.WAITLIST_REF,
    S.LOCATION_ID,
    S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    S.CLIENT_ID,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.SERVICE_ID,
    S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.FROM_DATE,
    S.FROM_TIME,
    S.TO_DATE,
    S.TO_TIME,
    S.CREATED_DATE,
    S.DELETED_DATE,
    S.LOCATION,
    S.CLIENT,
    S.CLIENT_PHONE_NUMBER,
    S.IS_NEW_CLIENT,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.SERVICE_NAME,
    S.CATEGORY_NAME,
    S.WAITLIST_STATUS,
    S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    S.NOTE,
    S.SKU,
    S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.DELETED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.SERVICE_DURATION,
    S.SERVICE_PRICE,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
  );
